summary: A young girl finds out some disturbing supernatural truths about her father, who has been a suspect to multiple murder cases.
cast: Bruce Dern|Cindy Sampson|Nicolas Wright|Robert Higden|Allison Graham|James Kidnie|Bronwen Mantel|Kwasi Songui|Mary-Pier Gaudet|Jenna Wheeler-Hughes|Marc V. Denis
title: Ciénaga diabólica
